front.title: External Media Gateway Control Protocol MIB XGCP-MIB

abstract.t: This memo defines an experimental portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, this proposal specifies a new XGCP-MIB module in a manner that is compliant to the SNMP SMI. The set of its objects is consistent with the SNMP framework and other existing SNMP standards.
